医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
能否训练人工智能模型来解释常规脑电图，其准确度与人类专家相当？研究人员测试了人工智能模型 SCORE-AI 能否以与人类专家相当的准确性来解释常规临床脑电图。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Can-an-AI-model-be-trained-to-interpret-routine-EEGs-with-accuracy-equivalent-to- human-experts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Can-an-AI-model-be-trained-to-interpret-routine-EEGs-with-accuracy-equivalent-to- human-experts.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f2744f4-3e25-43bc-86b0-bb9d0ce34ce9 Thu, 22 Jun 2023 04:16:00 -0400 Can an AI model be trained to interpret routine EEGs with accuracy equivalent to human experts?
COVID-19 疫苗接种与卵巢储备功能变化之间是否存在关联？研究人员探讨了女性接种 COVID-19 疫苗前后卵巢储备的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Is-there-an-association- Between-COVID-19-vaccination-and-changes-in-ovarian-reserve.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/Is-there-an-association- Between-COVID-19-vaccination-and-changes-in-ovarian-reserve.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad9bd0e6-b176-443f-beb0-14fdc9c1859e Thu, 22 Jun 2023 03:46:00 -0400 Is there an association between COVID-19 vaccination and changes in ovarian reserve?
ESPG 报告进一步租赁成功，并对 2018/2023 年债券的公开交换要约反应良好欧洲科学园集团 (ESPG) 是一家专门从事科学园的房地产公司，报告了进一步的租赁成功。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/ESPG-reports-further-leasing-successes-and-receives-good-response-to-the-public-exchange-offer-for-the-20182023-债券.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230622/ESPG-reports-further-leasing-successes-and-receives-good-response-to-the-public-exchange-offer-for-the-20182023- bond.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1f65e31-72a6-42ca-adf2-640c8e844de9 Thu, 22 Jun 2023 03:16:00 -0400 ESPG reports further leasing successes and receives good response to the public exchange offer for the 2018/2023 bond
科学家发现导致唐氏综合症心脏发育缺陷的分子机制出生时患有唐氏综合症的婴儿极易患先天性心脏缺陷，唐氏综合症是由 21 号染色体的额外拷贝或 21 三体引起的遗传病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Scientists-uncover-molecular-mechanism-contributing-to-defective-heart-development-in-Down-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Scientists-uncover-molecular-mechanism-contributing-to-defective-heart-development-in-Down-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e21b0e92-eeb0-4459-9611-3116a7ccf7ed Wed, 21 Jun 2023 23:59:47 -0400
年轻时失去父母会影响一个人以后的免疫系统密歇根大学的研究表明，当一个人在年轻时失去父母或照顾者时，他们的免疫系统在以后的生活中会受到影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Parental-loss-at-a-young-age-affects-a-persone28099s-immune-system-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Parental-loss-at-a-young-age-affects-a-persone28099s-immune-system-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f57ea1b4-636f-45c6-8ac2-36d4266edb53 Wed, 21 Jun 2023 23:47:00 -0400 Parental loss at a young age affects a person’s immune system later in life
揭露威胁：科学家展示气候变化如何助长病毒性呼吸道感染科学家们回顾了现有文献，以了解天气条件的变化如何影响病毒爆发、流行病和大流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Unmasking-the-threat-Scientists-show-how-climate-change-fuels-viral-respiratory-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Unmasking-the-threat-Scientists-show-how-climate-change-fuels-viral-respiratory-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96fbc43a-12da-4cef-9da0-c76192e0defe Wed, 21 Jun 2023 23:38:00 -0400 Unmasking the threat: Scientists show how climate change fuels viral respiratory infections
应对气候变化过敏：创新方法降低空气过敏原的风险气候变化会增加空气中的过敏原，从而加剧过敏性呼吸道疾病。本次审查探讨了缓解策略，包括实时监控和智能手机应用程序，以减少对健康的影响并改善结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Battling-climate-change-allergies-Innovative-approaches-mitigate-risks-of-airborne-allergens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Battling-climate-change-allergies-Innovative-approaches-mitigate-risks-of-airborne-allergens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d944b81-f3c9-4495-95aa-0bd741eced62 Wed, 21 Jun 2023 23:28:00 -0400 Battling climate change allergies: Innovative approaches mitigate risks of airborne allergens
重新利用癌症药物治疗疟疾随着疟疾的耐药性日益增强，UCF 的一组研究人员正在寻求使用抗癌药物来加速发现新的挽救生命的疾病疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Repurifying-cancer-drugs-for-malaria-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Repurifying-cancer-drugs-for-malaria-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa7f06c1-26e6-4ef9-8302-dcf39265c8d4 Wed, 21 Jun 2023 23:18:00 -0400 Repurposing cancer drugs for malaria treatment
吃富含 omega-3 脂肪酸的食物可能会减缓 ALS 患者的体力衰退肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 患者多吃富含某些 omega-3 脂肪酸的食物，如亚麻籽油、核桃、菜籽油和南瓜子，可能会减缓因疾病而导致的身体衰退，并可能稍微延长生存时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Eating-foods-high-in-omega-3-fatty-acids-may-lead-to-slower-physical-decline-in-people-with- ALS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Eating-foods-high-in-omega-3-fatty-acids-may-lead-to-slower-physical-decline-in-people-with- ALS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4828b416-a657-490b-aa12-dca2516477d6 Wed, 21 Jun 2023 23:15:50 -0400 Eating foods high in omega-3 fatty acids may lead to slower physical decline in people with ALS
摇篮曲引起共鸣：给婴儿唱歌可以加强联系并促进发育根据对 21 项研究的系统回顾，父母现场指导婴儿唱歌对婴儿的情绪调节、父母角色的确认和情感协调具有积极影响。在足月出生的正常发育婴儿中观察到了益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Lullabies-strike-a-chord-Singing-to-babies-strengthens-Bonds-and-boosts-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230621/Lullabies-strike-a-chord-Singing-to-babies-strengthens-Bonds-and-boosts-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4266430-06ba-44a4-84ad-cba51c043e72 Wed, 21 Jun 2023 23:15:00 -0400 Lullabies strike a chord: Singing to babies strengthens Bonds and boosts development
